quantities.math

This module defines common math operations on quantities.

Authors:
Nicolas Sicard

License:
www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt, Boost License 1.0

Standards:
http://www.bipm.org/en/si/si_brochure/

Source:
https://github.com/biozic/quantities

auto square(Q)(Q quantity) if (isQuantity!Q);
auto cubic(Q)(Q quantity) if (isQuantity!Q);
auto sqrt(Q)(Q quantity) if (isQuantity!Q && isFloatingPoint!(Q.valueType));
auto cbrt(Q)(Q quantity) if (isQuantity!Q && isFloatingPoint!(Q.valueType));
auto nthRoot(int n, Q)(Q quantity) if (isQuantity!Q && isFloatingPoint!(Q.valueType));
Q abs(Q)(Q quantity) if (isQuantity!Q && isFloatingPoint!(Q.valueType));
Basic math functions that work with Quantities where N is a builtin floating point type.

auto pow(int n, Q)(Q quantity) if (isQuantity!Q && isFloatingPoint!(Q.valueType));
Examples:
enum meter = unit!(double, "L");
enum liter = 0.001 * meter * meter * meter;

auto surface = 25 * square(meter);
auto side = sqrt(surface);
assert(side.value(meter).approxEqual(5));

auto volume = 27 * liter;
side = cbrt(volume);
assert(side.value(meter).approxEqual(0.3));

auto delta = -10 * meter;
assert(abs(delta) == 10 * meter);


template Inverse(Q) if (isQuantity!Q)
template Product(Q1, Q2) if (isQuantity!Q1 && isQuantity!Q2)
template Quotient(Q1, Q2) if (isQuantity!Q1 && isQuantity!Q2)
template Square(Q) if (isQuantity!Q)
template Cubic(Q) if (isQuantity!Q)
Utility templates to manipulate quantity types.
